subject: Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The lawyer for the Italian cyclist Riccardo Ricco said Ricco was found guilty by a French court of a doping offense during the 2008 Tour de France.
snippet: The lawyer for the Italian cyclist Riccardo Ricco said Ricco was found guilty by a French court of a doping offense during the 2008 Tour de France.
